citation: mt nathan land owners pty ltd (in liquidation) v morris and others [2008] qsc 239 parties: mt nathan land owners pty ltd (in liquidation) acn 073 540 619 (plaintiff) and trevor douglas morris (first defendant) and john mctaggart (second defendant) and kevin francis gill (third defendant) and james graham (fourth defendant) and robert eugene murphy (fifth defendant) and deacons graham & james (a firm) (sixth defendant) file no/s: 8265 of 2004 division: trial division proceeding: civil trial originating court: supreme court at brisbane delivered on: 3 october 2008 delivered at: brisbane hearing dates: 8, 9, 11, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 21, 22, 23 april, 29 may, and 11 june 2008 judge: atkinson j orders: the plaintiff's claims against the first, second, third, fifth and sixth defendants are dismissed. the claims by the first and second defendants against the fifth and sixth defendants; the third defendant against the fifth and sixth defendant; the fifth defendant against the first, second, third and fourth defendants; and the sixth defendant against the first, second, third and fourth defendants are dismissed.  corporations
